effect.Name: Mode 7 (Switch)
effect.description: Shader giving Mode 7 style perspective effect.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Mode 7 Shader | 1.3 (02.05.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader giving Mode 7 style perspective effect.

parameter.name: ( Position )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position in the texture.

parameter.name: Position X
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the texture in the X axis.

parameter.name: Position Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the texture in the Y axis.

parameter.name: Position Z
parameter.description: *Variable that specifies the position of the texture in the Z-axis. (Otherwise known as scale).

parameter.name: ( Rotation )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the rotation in the texture.

parameter.name: Rotation X
parameter.description: A variable that determines rotation in the X axis.

parameter.name: Rotation Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines rotation in the Y axis.

parameter.name: Rotation Z
parameter.description: *The variable that determines rotation in the Z-axis. (This is otherwise known as the displacement of the point of the center of the perspective in the Y axis).

parameter.name: ( Points Position )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position of point.

parameter.name: Point X
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the X axis.

parameter.name: Point Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Camera Extra Options )
parameter.description: Here are additional options for the camera.

parameter.name: Offset X
parameter.description: A variable that determines the shift of the perspective center point in the X axis.

parameter.name: Distortion Of Perspective
parameter.description: A variable specifying how much the texture should be curved to give perspective immediately. (0 is no curvature, 1 is the default value giving perspective effect).

parameter.name: ( Texture Scale )
parameter.description: Here are the variables that determine the scale of the texture.

parameter.name: Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines the overall scale of the texture (in X and Y axes).

parameter.name: Scale X
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the texture in the X axis.

parameter.name: Scale Y
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the texture in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Rendering Options )
parameter.description: Here are the options for how the texture should be rendered.

parameter.name: Looping Mode!
parameter.description: This variable determines how the texture is to be looped: 0 - REPEAT (Repeats the texture image); 1 - MIRRORED REPEAT (Repeats the texture image, but reflects the image at each repetition); 2 - CLAMP TO EDGE (Extends the texture after crossing coordinates 0 and 1); 3 - CLAMP TO BORDER (After crossing coordinates 0 and 1, the texture will be invisible). For more information, visit: https://learnopengl.com/Getting-started/Textures

parameter.name: Render Sky
parameter.description: This variable determines whether the "sky" should be visible. (This is a reflection of the floor with the axes reversed.)

parameter.name: Change Texture Final Result
parameter.description: This variable determines whether the default texture is an object or background texture.
